summary.p: Returns the left part of a string with the specified number of characters.

syntax.code: LEFT(str AS string, numberOfChars AS int) RETURNS string

param.name: str
param.p: The string to get the left part from.

param.name: numberOfChars
param.p: Is a positive integer that specifies how many characters of str will be returned.

returns.p: If numberOfChars is negative, an error is returned. Otherwise the left part of str with numberOfChars number of characters is returned.
